name: Harpy Gaiden
description:
Harpy Gaiden is the third installment of the Day in the Life of a Harpy series, and with it, it brings a whole new story, a whole new character, and the most refined and fun game to come out of the series to date.

In this game, you play as Radi instead of Duri, and you must use your bow to take out any obstacles in your way. You can draw back your bow longer to shoot arrows farther, and you can collect 100 spades to heal yourself, you can also heal by reaching a checkpoint.

This game includes multiple endings, the player must collect a blade in each level in order to get the true ending. There are 7 levels, 1 secret level, and a much more difficult new game + with unique enemies, a new soundtrack, and a special level returning from one of the older games!

The controls are as follows:

Z - Jump, X - Attack, Left / Right - Move, Enter - Pause, Up / Down - Aim
